constructor.details: Initializes the contract by setting the deployer as the initial owner.

params.contributor: Address of the contributor whose status we are checking

returns._0: Boolean value indicating whether the address is a contributor or not

manageContributor(address,bool).details: Can only be called by the owner.Emits ***ContributorUpdate*** event.

params.grantRole: A boolean value signifying whether the contributor role is being granted (`true`) or revoked  (`false`)

renounceOwnership().details: Can only be called by the current owner.Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is  only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Can only be called by the current owner.

params.newOwner: Address of the new owner's account

isContributor(address).notice: Used to check if the address is one of the contributors.

manageContributor(address,bool).notice: Adds or removes a contributor to the smart contract.

owner().notice: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().notice: Leaves the contract without owner. Functions using the `onlyOwner` modifier will be disabled.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new owner.

documentation.text: @dev Reverts if called by any account other than the owner or an approved contributor.
@dev Reverts if called by any account other than the owner.
@dev Initializes the contract by setting the deployer as the initial owner.

@notice Returns the address of the current owner.
 @return Address of the current owner

@notice Used to verify that the caller is either the owner or a contributor.
 @dev If the caller is not the owner or a contributor, the execution will be reverted.

@notice Used to verify that the caller is the owner.
 @dev If the caller is not the owner, the execution will be reverted.
